name: VentiSys Technology
tag_list: cyber-security, cloud, endpoint-security, software-consultancy, enterprise-software, virtualisation
overview:
VentiSys was incorporated in 2007 to provide high end software consultancy to the marketplace.

We develop software products, as well as provide consultancy and advice on approach and implementation. We are specialist in implementing Lean and Six Sigma approaches, to business processes, and also business process re-engineering. We also specialise in I.T Infrastructure leveraging cloud, and we champion cutting edge information and data security paradigms.

offices.address1: Cyber Security Division, VentiSys Technology Ltd, The Innovation Centre
offices.address2: Institute of Technology Sligo, Ash Lane
